result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. LC Knuckles II

119PM
Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State. Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Kristyne Watson. Clerk JT  Minutes: DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over to Br 6.   Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court.  Bond continued as previously set. DE motion to modify bond-arguments heard-court denies motion. ec

records.addlTxt: 02:01 PM    Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in custody.  Clerk JT  Minutes: Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 01:00 pm. Attorney status.  Bond continued w/ same conditions (see previous bond entry). SPD has not appointed counsel for DE. DE waives time for the preliminay hearing. rb
Applicant is eligible, no attorney assigned.

State appeared by Attorney Drew Lehman. Defendant LC Knuckles appears in custody.  Clerk: PU
  Minutes:    SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *No Weapons especially firearms and edged weapons.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Andrea Y. C, Walmart - Kenosha Co.
